structure.unit: Proprietors Of Wharves, Real Estate Lying In Common, And General Fields

law.catch_line: Fields Established By Court Order; Management
law.text: After a common or general field is so established by an order of the court, the further proceedings in relation thereto shall be the same as are provided when a field is so enclosed by the consent of the proprietors; and the proprietors shall be entitled to the privileges and be subject to the duties before provided in this chapter relative to the proprietors of fields enclosed by consent.
